tokenize: all the passages , questions and answers

tokenize.from sentence: We first tokenize all the passages , questions and answers .

word embeddings.from sentence: We use word embeddings from GloVe to initialize the model .

ADAMAX.from sentence: We use ADAMAX with the coefficients ? 1 = 0.9 and ? 2 = 0.999 to optimize the model .

Words.from sentence: Words not found in Glo Ve are initialized as zero vectors .

dimensionality l.from sentence: The dimensionality l of the hidden layers is set to be 150 or 300 .
